content:
Yes, there are several good places to grab a snack or lunch near Lynn Museum. Here are some popular options:

1. Marriott's Warehouse: Located by the river, this restaurant serves up high-quality food in a charming setting. It is a great place to go for lunch or a snack. 2. Market Bistro: This cozy bistro-style restaurant, located in the town center, offers a range of dishes including sandwiches, soups, and salads, perfect for a light lunch or snack. 3. The Bank House: A traditional pub located opposite the museum, it serves pub food and has a family-friendly atmosphere. 4. Cafe Moccha: This popular cafe serves a range of light bites, hot drinks, and cakes, which is perfect after exploring the museum. 5. The Gingerbread House: An artisan bakery and coffee shop located near the Lynn Museum. They offer freshly baked bread, cakes, and pastries. These are just some of the many options available near the museum - there are plenty to choose from to suit your taste and budget.
